semantic_identifier: [GOLD-164]: Integrations_connectors v2: Fix Jira/Linear bi-directional status sync to prevent stale/looping updates
title: Integrations_connectors v2: Fix Jira/Linear bi-directional status sync to prevent stale/looping updates

sections.text: Resolve an issue where status changes between Jira/Linear and Issue_Tracker don’t reliably propagate or can bounce back due to missing source-of-truth and idempotency handling. Implement per-issue sync metadata (last_synced_state, last_synced_at, and origin) and update logic to ignore self-generated updates while still applying legitimate remote changes. Ensure transitions map correctly across systems and add targeted logs/metrics to surface dropped or conflicting updates.
